name: Derrick May
description: '''Derrick May''' (born April 6, 1963), also known as '''Mayday''' and '''{{not a typo|Rhythim}} Is {{not a typo|Rhythim}}''', is an American [[electronic music]]ian from [[Belleville, Michigan]], United States. May is credited with pioneering [[techno music]] in the 1980s along with collaborators [[Juan Atkins]] and [[Kevin Saunderson]], commonly known as [[The Belleville Three]]. According to Sal Cinquemani of ''[[American Songwriter]]'', May is "one of the most influential of [[Detroit]]â€™s wiz kids."
